00007 """ Unit tests for the easy_xml.py file. """

00009 import gyp.easy_xml as easy_xml
00010 import unittest
00011 import StringIO
00012 
00013 
00014 class TestSequenceFunctions(unittest.TestCase):
00015 
00016   def setUp(self):
00017     self.stderr = StringIO.StringIO()
00018 
00019   def test_EasyXml_simple(self):
00020     self.assertEqual(
00021       easy_xml.XmlToString(['test']),
00022       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><test/>')
00023 
00024     self.assertEqual(
00025       easy_xml.XmlToString(['test'], encoding='Windows-1252'),
00026       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="Windows-1252"?><test/>')
00027 
00028   def test_EasyXml_simple_with_attributes(self):
00029     self.assertEqual(
00030       easy_xml.XmlToString(['test2', {'a': 'value1', 'b': 'value2'}]),
00031       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><test2 a="value1" b="value2"/>')
00032 
00033   def test_EasyXml_escaping(self):
00034     original = '<test>\'"\r&\nfoo'
00035     converted = '&lt;test&gt;\'&quot;&#xD;&amp;&#xA;foo'
00036     converted_apos = converted.replace("'", '&apos;')
00037     self.assertEqual(
00038       easy_xml.XmlToString(['test3', {'a': original}, original]),
00039       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><test3 a="%s">%s</test3>' %
00040       (converted, converted_apos))
00041 
00042   def test_EasyXml_pretty(self):
00043     self.assertEqual(
00044       easy_xml.XmlToString(
00045           ['test3',
00046             ['GrandParent',
00047               ['Parent1',
00048                 ['Child']
00049               ],
00050               ['Parent2']
00051             ]
00052           ],
00053           pretty=True),
00054       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>\n'
00055       '<test3>\n'
00056       '  <GrandParent>\n'
00057       '    <Parent1>\n'
00058       '      <Child/>\n'
00059       '    </Parent1>\n'
00060       '    <Parent2/>\n'
00061       '  </GrandParent>\n'
00062       '</test3>\n')
00063 
00064 
00065   def test_EasyXml_complex(self):
00066     # We want to create:
00067     target = (
00068       '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>'
00069       '<Project>'
00070         '<PropertyGroup Label="Globals">'
00071           '<ProjectGuid>{D2250C20-3A94-4FB9-AF73-11BC5B73884B}</ProjectGuid>'
00072           '<Keyword>Win32Proj</Keyword>'
00073           '<RootNamespace>automated_ui_tests</RootNamespace>'
00074         '</PropertyGroup>'
00075         '<Import Project="$(VCTargetsPath)\\Microsoft.Cpp.props"/>'
00076         '<PropertyGroup '
00077             'Condition="\'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)\'=='
00078                        '\'Debug|Win32\'" Label="Configuration">'
00079           '<ConfigurationType>Application</ConfigurationType>'
00080           '<CharacterSet>Unicode</CharacterSet>'
00081         '</PropertyGroup>'
00082       '</Project>')
00083 
00084     xml = easy_xml.XmlToString(
00085         ['Project',
00086           ['PropertyGroup', {'Label': 'Globals'},
00087             ['ProjectGuid', '{D2250C20-3A94-4FB9-AF73-11BC5B73884B}'],
00088             ['Keyword', 'Win32Proj'],
00089             ['RootNamespace', 'automated_ui_tests']
00090           ],
00091           ['Import', {'Project': '$(VCTargetsPath)\\Microsoft.Cpp.props'}],
00092           ['PropertyGroup',
00093             {'Condition': "'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Debug|Win32'",
00094              'Label': 'Configuration'},
00095             ['ConfigurationType', 'Application'],
00096             ['CharacterSet', 'Unicode']
00097           ]
00098         ])
00099     self.assertEqual(xml, target)
